subject: Re: I'm Going to Post a Couple from FB #27
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
These are interesting Steve. :)

Curently, I have been using two 12-470s piped into a mixer and direct 
recorded.  The only editing has been normalizing the audio to 60db 
and trimming it out of the original recording.

This week I am switching to direct recording from a single 12-470 box 
with an amplified mic for my voice, and headphones to monitor the 
audio coming out of the radio and into the recorder.  I will post my 
results accordingly, as I am working to try and get clearer responses 
without much clean-up.  

My first response within seconds after hooking it all up as described 
was "Better, Chuck."  I think when the recorder has to pick up the 
sounds from a speaker, it adds much more noise that may not need to 
be there. ;)

- LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> The random mode on this box never worked, which i feel is a great 
> feature.  I changed the antenna with a piece of 20 guage wire from 
work 
> and now the random seems to work really well, i really don't 
understand 
> why.  This was my first session with the random on #27, let me know 
> what you guys think.  I left it as raw of files i could.  There is 
a 
> couple up for interpretation that i'm not really sure of and 
another 
> that says "He wants to see if it's working".  I hear "He wants to 
see" 
> very clearly and i personally hear "if it's working", but that may 
just 
> be my mind wanting to hear that.  I'm only 2 min. in to this 
recording 
> from this morning, but i have to get to work so i will post what 
i've 
> got so far.
> 
> -Steve H.
>
